p: The map of co-authorships associated with the MERS literature presents the names of many Middle Eastern countries including Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Lebanon, Iran, Tunisia, Qatar, Oman, Jordan, and United Arab Emirates which is a clear indication into the exceptionally strong representation of the authors from this region in these studies. The strongest network of co-authorships on this topic are observed between authors from the United States and those of Saudi Arabia, followed by China, United Kingdom, Egypt, South Korea, Canada and the Netherlands. The closest collaborators of Chinese authors on this topic, after the United states, have been from Saudi Arabia, United Kingdom and Egypt. The closest collaborators of Saudi Arabia, after the United States, have been Egypt, China and United Kingdom.
